character.noteList:
Tiefling Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Gain fire resistance • Can cast the thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level, hellish rebuke (1/day). At 5th level, darkness (1/day) (use Cha for DCs) Criminal Feature: • You know someone who can connect you with other criminals Fighter Features: • Fighting Style - Dueling: +2 damage when using a single one-handed weapon • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Take an extra action once between rests Rogue Features: • Double proficiency with chosen skills • Sneak Attack (2d6) • Understand a secret language • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Deception,Intimidation) • Fighter Archetype: Eldritch Knight • Form a magical bond with a weapon (see rules) • You can dash, disengage, or hide as a bonus action • Alert: You don't grant advantage vs hidden creatures, you are never surprised, and you gain +5 to initiative • Rogue Archetype: Assassin • You are proficient with poisoner's kits and disguise kits • You always crit surprised creatures and you have advantage vs creatures who haven't acted • You can make two attacks on your turn ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields Light Armor ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of gaming set Thieves' Tools Thieves' Tools Disguise kit Poisoner's kit ⊠Common Infernal Thieves' Cant ⊠chain mail rapier martial weapon handaxe (2) dungeoneer's pack crowbar set of dark common clothes hood belt pouch
circlet of blasting - cast scorching ray w/ +5 to attack once per day ring of spell storing - holds 5 levels of spells: Dimension Door, Arms Of Hadar⊠⊠Fighter 5, Rogue 3⊠Tiefling⊠Criminal⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Corzo⊠Fighter 5, Rogue 3⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0
